item.title: Walking in Covenant Relationship with Christ
item.description:
Walking in Covenant Relationship with Christ by President Emily Belle Freeman, Young Women General President given in Sunday Morning of 193rd Semiannual General Conference on Sat Sep 30 2023
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: President Emily Belle Freeman, Young Women General President
